channel.media:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God
channel.itunes:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God
channel.googleplay:description: John Piper is founder and teacher of desiringGod.org; he is author of more than 50 books and travels regularly to preach and teach. New messages are posted to this podcast as they become available. Piper’s sermons, books, articles, and more are available free of charge at desiringGod.org. We want people everywhere to understand and embrace the truth that God is most glorified in us, when we are most satisfied in him.
channel.itunes:author: Desiring God

item.title: The True Grace of Christian Camaraderie
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: Grace is always personal. God mediates his grace to undeserving sinners through the warm affections of his divine family, the church.
item.itunes:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God

media:content.media:title: The True Grace of Christian Camaraderie
media:content.media:description: Grace is always personal. God mediates his grace to undeserving sinners through the warm affections of his divine family, the church.

item.title: Sons of Liberty and Joy: How a Christian Relates to the State
item.itunes:subtitle: How a Christian Relates to the State
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: Christians claim their true citizenship in heaven. When we submit to earthly governments, we do so out of allegiance to Christ's eternal kingdom.
item.itunes:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God

media:content.media:title: Sons of Liberty and Joy: How a Christian Relates to the State
media:content.media:description: Christians claim their true citizenship in heaven. When we submit to earthly governments, we do so out of allegiance to Christ's eternal kingdom.
